ILEWrapper

this is a wrapper for the ILEincludes-f8

Summary
ILEWrapper
this is a wrapper for the ILEincludes-f8
Private Vars
bLoaded
a boolean tells if ileincludes have been loaded
mcClip
acts as a listener for the ASBroadcaster events broadcast from the includes
Constructor
ILEWrapper
Initilization
init
loadIle
create an empty movieclip (mcIleIncludes) on the root and loads ileIncludes-f8.swf
getClipPlayer
returns reference to the clipPlayer

Private Vars

bLoaded

private var bLoaded: Boolean

a boolean tells if ileincludes have been loaded

mcClip

acts as a listener for the ASBroadcaster events broadcast from the includes

Parameters
